triple.name: affordablesupplies2html
triple.info: Credits: School of Business, University of Wisconsin-Madison.
triple.notes:
3 errors:
The XHTML head element is missing; it is required. The validator complains that the {http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}body content alone in {http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}html it not enough.
There is an alt attribute missing on the img output.
The value of the href on the img element output it taken from a #PCDATA-declared element's text value. This may contain non-URL strings, such as the string of a single tab character (which is the first example the validator can find).
